title: Nanotechnology in food packaging materials: role and application of nanoparticles
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21832-21858
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03711A, Review Article

Maria del Rosario Herrera-Rivera, Sandra P. Torres-Arellanes, Carlos Inocencio Cortés-Martínez, Diana C. Navarro-Ibarra, Laura Hernández-Sánchez, Francisco Solis-Pomar, Eduardo Pérez-Tijerina, Ramón Román-Doval
Global concerns about food security, driven by rising demand, have prompted the exploration of nanotechnology as a solution to enhance food supply.
